
{{alias}}
    Regular expression to capture a Windows filename extension.

    When executed against dotfile filenames (e.g., `.gitignore`), the regular
    expression does not capture the basename as a filename extension.

    Examples
    --------
    > var ext = {{alias}}.exec( 'C:\\foo\\bar\\index.js' )[ 1 ]
    '.js'
    > ext = {{alias}}.exec( 'C:\\foo\\bar\\.gitignore' )[ 1 ]
    ''
    > ext = {{alias}}.exec( 'foo\\file.pdf' )[ 1 ]
    '.pdf'
    > ext = {{alias}}.exec( '\\foo\\bar\\file' )[ 1 ]
    ''
    > ext = {{alias}}.exec( beep\\boop.' )[ 1 ]
    '.'
    > ext = {{alias}}.exec( 'index.js' )[ 1 ]
    '.js'
    > ext = {{alias}}.exec( '' )[ 1 ]
    ''

    See Also
    --------
